channel.title: Easy on Dante's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Easy on Dante's blog

item.title: Alert
item.description:
Initial Recon

We found there are two forbidden directories and some other accessible files

→ /uploads
→ /messages 
→ messages.php
→ contact

So we got a home web page where we can upload .md file

Using burp we figure out how it executing script we used

 </body> <script>alert('xss') </script>

and confirmed it is vulnerable

</body> ⇒ we used this so the <script> could execute out side of the <body>

→ and we figured out the file we uploading is saved on the database and we can share it using a link that is provided to view it.

item.title: Sightless
item.description:
Initial Recon

we found three ports

21 → ftp (which kick us out)
22 → ssh 
80 → http

subdomain enum

ffuf -c -u http://sightless.htb/ -H "HOST: FUZZ.sightless.htb" -w /path/to/your/preferred/wordlist

→ for subdomain enumeration we used two wordlist they both might work

→ /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/DNS/dns-Jhaddix.txt

→/usr/share/seclists/Discovery/DNS/n0kovo_subdomains.txt

but the wordlist is too big so we filtered based on first letter it using grep

we know it show’s they gave a service sqlpad so out of guess we used s
